A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The series has taken a different turn for sure\, and I don’t really agree with the way it has been turned. Filled with unnecessary (and thin) characters\, The Last Jedi sets the series in a new direction that definitely comes with plot holes and space to be filled. The film was entertaining to a fault\, but at this point\, I feel as if I’m passing it because of the status is Star Wars itself. Rey and Finn both are flat characters and Rose was an unnecessary addition. Poe and Kylo Ren come into their characters more\, but at the expense of some crazy and questionable plot twists. It’s unfortunate the series has gone the way it has\, but the Star Wars memory will always be there
